comment._content:
Statue of Gambetta in Indochine Saigon:
on Place de Gambetta (Blvd Charner) - 2nd site:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/13476480@N07/4483160234/sizes/l/in/set-72157623615224565/]
on Blvd Norodom (near behind Notre Dame Cathedral) - first site: 
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/13476480@N07/4478121990/sizes/o/in/set-72157623615224565/]
in "Jardin de Ville" of Saigon (parc Maurice Long) - 3rd site:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/13476480@N07/4477498557/in/set-72157623615224565/]
